alert.note: Alert for Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:26PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Thomas and southeastern Rawlins Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Rexford, or 15 miles southeast of Atwood, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gem around 1045 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas.
